title: Shawl, ca. 1840
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: twill weave with supplementary weft
description: Square shawl of fine red wool with warp fringe. Thin cream-colored cross-stripes form large squares, each with a small floral motif in white, black and green.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shawl, ca. 1840.
ca. 1840. Medium: wool
Technique: twill weave with supplementary weft. Gift of Mrs. Cole Younger. 1959-109-1.
